cars.description: This is an immaculate 1976 British Roadster with only 125000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This vintage Chevrolet Bel Air Convertible, with 5 passenger seating, is a true beauty.  Original vintage details give drivers the feeling of traveling back in time.
Original red color, red custom painted rims, a little rust on the trim but a smooth ride.
This car will brighten up your day with its original Grille and Tail Light. 200,000 miles and in mint condition
Fun orange color, spacious, propane tank included, pull out bed.
Has some dents and dings but still a beauty with only 100,000 miles on it. Original wheels, 5 cd changer, custom head unit, leather interior.
